channel.title: Final Dreamz! (Hybrid PVP source)
channel.description:
Hello! Jake here and today I am asking members from the community to consider helping me creating a server :)
[size=18pt][font=georgia]Intro[/font][/size]
The reason for me wanting to create this server is because I started getting back into RSPS and played a few servers and noticed. . .Things have changed. To me this is a good change and a great opportunity for me to try and make something of a server. What my expectations are for this server is "FAIRNESS" and no offense to those other servers out there, but a lot of them to focus on the word or meaning. I want to get the word established to the server before I start looking for "UNIQUENESS" which is what people aim for.
[size=18pt][font=georgia]Positions[/font][/size]
Now my thinking is "why hire a staff in early development? There isn't a server to be moderated. . " So no admins/mods for now that will come later.
I would like if someone would create a forum so the position of FORUM HOSTER is available.
I must have a team of BETA TESTERS I prefer a maximum of five testers. We will meet on a Hamachi channel and that is how you will access the server.
Any other positions you can think of make sure it is in a [size=19pt]NICE AND CLEAN!!!!!![/size] format or it will not be read. Thank you.
[size=18pt][font=georgia]Media[/font][/size]
All I really did so far was add a few specs for some weapons and changed home not a big deal :p
Shops (probably gonna change) [IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/shops.png[/img]
Overdose works [IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/Overload.png[/img]
Overload stats [IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/overloadstats.png[/img]
Home (varrock west bank) [IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/homeatwestvarrock.png[/img]
Cursed prayers (not complete) [IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac238/flamezpkz/Cursedstatsnotallworking.png[/img]
Thank you for taking the time to read and look at what I had to say. If you are intrested reply with a position or message me either one will work. :)
~~~JAKE~~~

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

2.It has Memory Leaks
3. 508 + shit on a 317 is not cool…[/quote]

  2. “”
  3. He can cancel that out; not very hard.

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:5, topic:406625”]I wouldn’t have said that if he were the first person or 2 that has used it but every fucking RSPS now is using that as it’s base.
Lordy570 need’s to stop releasing his source’s.[/quote]Don’t worry he won’t be releasing his new one considering it has party room etc.

item.title: Final Dreamz! (Hybrid PVP source)
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:4, topic:406625”]R.A.R.E.S. I understand you have only recently come back from RSPS’.

May I give you a very good piece of advice?

Don’t use Hybrid PVP as a source. It’s probably the most hated base.[/quote]

What would you reccomend then? I mean that is the reason i chose this source is because I felt that this was the new thing hahaha and that this type of server was what people wanted I guess I can go back to the old 317’s and practically start from scratch I guess

Read full topic
